title: Vegetarian moussaka
ingredients: ['1 aubergine, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 large courgette, thinly sliced', '2 potatoes, thinly sliced', '1 onion, sliced', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 tablespoon vinegar', '1 (400g) tin whole peeled tomatoes, chopped', '1/2 (410g) tin lentils, drained, juice reserved', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', 'salt and pepper to taste', '150g crumbled feta cheese', '1 1/2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '300ml milk', 'black pepper to taste', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 egg, beaten', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
